For US customers, eyewear products are categorized as Class 1 medical devices by the 21 Code of Federal Regulations (CFR) - Food and Drug Administration (FDA). Baltini ships eyewear orders on a Delivery Duties Paid (DDP) basis. This means that all applicable duties are included in the final price calculated at the checkout and there are no additional costs due upon delivery.

products.brandedName: Hyacinth House Blue Toile Long Sleeve Georgina Midi Dress
products.unbrandedName: Hyacinth House Blue Toile Long Sleeve Georgina Midi Dress
products.description: Hyacinth House represents classic femininity while edging on the side of flirty, bohemian, and playful. Through vibrant florals, textured ruffles, and bold patterns, the collection inspires women to embrace their romantic and whimsical side, seeking adventure, excitement, and celebration. The Georgina Dress is a perfect go-to midi for dressing up or down, boasting an effortless silhouette with an abstract blue and white toile design. A square neckline, smocked bodice, long sleeves with smocked cuffs, and ruffle details on shoulders as well on skirt gives it an extra special touch you're sure to love. Style with espadrilles and a raffia tote for a warm-weather vacation or pair with strappy heels and gold earrings for a luncheon. Square neckline Long sleeves with smocked cuffs Ruffle detail at shoulders Smocked bodice Gathered skirt Midi length Pullover styling Lined Slub cotton, linen like fabric Material: 100% Cotton (body), 100% Cotton (lining) Care: Hand wash cold, hang to dry, iron low

ABOUT THE BRAND Founded in 1922 in St. Gallen, Switzerland, the name Akris was derived from founder Alice-Kriemler Schoch's initials. Akris punto was later launched in 1995 with a relaxed, understated mindset. With a range of contemporary looks including architectural silhouettes, graphic prints and colorblocking, each piece is finished with an athletic edge. products.name: Multi Blakeney Midi Knitted Dress
products.brandedName: Barbour Multi Blakeney Midi Knitted Dress
products.description: Since 1894, J. Barbour® & Sons has remained a family-owned heritage of quality. With three Royal Warrants proudly featured in every coat, it's no surprise that in our quest for quality, we turn to Barbour® season after season. The perfect closet staple exists in the Barbour Blakeney Knitted Midi Dress. This textured multi-stripe design features V-neck detailing to the front and back for a flattering touch while deep side splits to the leg finish this piece off with a summer-ready look. Wear with platform sandals and a tote for the warm-weather months, or under a sweater with boots as the weather starts to turn. products.name: Collarless Cropped Icon Denim Jacket

products.description: Low stretch cropped denim jacket. Collarless, button front. Long puff sleeves with button cuffs. Button-flap patch pockets at chest. Button tabs at rear hem. Raw hem. Responsibly Made: This denim jacket is part of our water-saving Washwell program. Compared with conventional wash methods, Washwell uses at least 20% less water and has saved over a billion liters of water since 2016. * Fit: Slightly fitted. Sits close to the body. Cropped, hits at the waist. Models wearing Gap size S are 5'8"–5'11" (172–180 cm) with 23. 5–26" (60–66 cm) waist & 33–38" (84–97 cm) hips. Models wearing Gap size XL are 5'8"–5'11" (172–180 cm) with 34–36” (86–91 cm) waist & 45–50" (114–127 cm) hips.
